name: flash-anzan
description: フラッシュ暗算で脳を鍛えよう

scripts.import-bootstrap-css: find node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css -type f -name 'bootstrap.min.css*' | xargs -IXXX cp XXX src/assets/
scripts.import-bootstrap-js: find node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js -type f -name 'bootstrap.bundle.min.js*' | xargs -IXXX cp XXX src/assets/
scripts.import-bootstrap: npm run import-bootstrap-css && npm run import-bootstrap-js
scripts.import-simple-keyboard-css: find node_modules/simple-keyboard/build -type f -name 'index.css' | xargs -IXXX cp XXX src/assets/simple-keyboard.css
scripts.import-simple-keyboard-js: find node_modules/simple-keyboard/build -type f -name 'index.js' | xargs -IXXX cp XXX src/assets/simple-keyboard.js
scripts.import-simple-keyboard: npm run import-simple-keyboard-css && npm run import-simple-keyboard-js
